greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(0)=1, a(1)=-2; a(n+2) = a(n+1) + a(n) + (period 3: repeat 3, 1, -1).
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,1,1,-1,-1).
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(2 x^4 + 3 x^2 - 3 x + 1) / (x^5 + x^4 - x^3 - x^2 - x + 1), {x, 0, 40}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 05 2013 *)
program: (MAGMA) I:=[1,-2,2,1,2]; [n le 5 select I[n] else Self(n-1)+Self(n-2)+Self(n-3)-Self(n-4)-Self(n-5): n in [1..40]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 05 2013
results.author: _Paul Curtz_, Jun 04 2013
